sections.jesusTitle: The Life and Teachings of Jesus
sections.jesusDescription: Explore the complete life story and teachings of Jesus as revealed in the Urantia Book, from his birth through resurrection, with insights beyond traditional Biblical accounts.
sections.cosmicDescription: Discover the cosmic teachings from the first three parts of The Urantia Book, covering everything from the nature of God to universe structure and Earth's planetary history.

status.noSeries: No series found in this category.
status.searchNoResults: No series found matching your search. Try adjusting your filters.

jesus-1.title: Beyond Traditional Religion: The True Nature of God
jesus-1.description: Comparing conventional religious concepts of God with the expanded Urantia perspective
jesus-1.logline: Discover the loving Universal Father behind religious traditions and transform your relationship with a God who values love over fear.

jesus-2.title: Jesus Revealed: Beyond the Biblical Account
jesus-2.description: Exploring aspects of Jesus' life not found in traditional Christian texts
jesus-2.logline: Explore untold stories of Jesus' travels, education, and experiences that shaped the divine human who changed our world forever.

jesus-3.title: The Inner Divine Presence: Thought Adjusters & Holy Spirit
jesus-3.description: Comparing traditional concepts of divine guidance with Urantia teachings
jesus-3.logline: Understand the remarkable connection between your mind and God's indwelling spirit, transcending traditional concepts of spiritual guidance.

jesus-4.title: Life After Death: The Mansion World Journey
jesus-4.description: Contrasting traditional afterlife concepts with the Urantia cosmology
jesus-4.logline: Discover what happens after death according to the Urantia Book—a progressive journey of growth far beyond traditional concepts of heaven.

jesus-5.title: Women in Spiritual Leadership: A New Perspective
jesus-5.description: Comparing historical religious views of women with Jesus' revolutionary approach
jesus-5.logline: Meet the remarkable women who followed Jesus and discover his revolutionary approach to gender equality that was centuries ahead of his time.

jesus-6.title: Good & Evil Reconsidered: Beyond Traditional Theology
jesus-6.description: Reframing traditional concepts of sin and evil through Urantia teachings
jesus-6.logline: Explore the true origins of evil, sin, and suffering, and discover a cosmic perspective that transcends traditional religious explanations.

jesus-7.title: Prayer & Worship: Enhanced Understanding
jesus-7.description: Expanding traditional views of communication with the Divine
jesus-7.logline: Transform your spiritual practices with deeper insights into prayer and worship that enhance personal communication with the Divine.

jesus-8.title: Angels & Celestial Beings: The Cosmic Hierarchy
jesus-8.description: Comparing traditional angelic concepts with the expanded Urantia cosmology
jesus-8.logline: Meet the countless celestial personalities who serve throughout the universe, far beyond traditional religious concepts of angels.

jesus-9.title: The Kingdom of Heaven: Spiritual Reality vs. Religious Concept
jesus-9.description: Contrasting traditional religious concepts with Jesus' actual teachings
jesus-9.logline: Discover Jesus' true message about the spiritual kingdom—not a future realm, but a present reality of divine relationship.

jesus-10.title: Jesus' Transformative Moments: Behind the Familiar Stories
jesus-10.description: Providing deeper context for familiar Biblical events
jesus-10.logline: Experience familiar biblical stories with expanded details and cosmic context that transforms their spiritual significance.

jesus-11.title: The Human Experience: Divine Insights on Daily Challenges
jesus-11.description: Addressing universal human concerns through Urantia wisdom
jesus-11.logline: Cosmic wisdom for everyday problems—practical divine insights that enhance relationships, work, and personal fulfillment.

jesus-12.title: Jesus' Death & Resurrection: The Expanded Narrative
jesus-12.description: Offering revelatory details beyond traditional accounts
jesus-12.logline: The crucifixion and resurrection reveal a cosmic victory with universal implications beyond religious doctrine about sin and salvation.

jesus-13.title: Evolving Faith: From Traditional Religion to Cosmic Truth
jesus-13.description: Bridging conventional religious concepts with expanded spiritual understanding
jesus-13.logline: Religious concepts evolve like everything else—see how spiritual truth has progressed from primitive belief toward cosmic revelation.

jesus-14.title: The Human Jesus: Beyond the Divine Image
jesus-14.description: Humanizing Jesus beyond traditional religious portrayals
jesus-14.logline: Jesus laughed, had hobbies, and experienced emotions—discover the fully human person behind the religious icon.

cosmic-1.title: Cosmic Origins: Understanding Universe Creation
cosmic-1.description: Introducing the fundamental cosmology of the Urantia revelation
cosmic-1.logline: Explore the magnificent architecture of creation—from eternal Paradise to the evolving universes of time and space.

cosmic-2.title: Divine Personalities: The Beings Beyond Traditional Religion
cosmic-2.logline: Meet the divine personalities who sustain the universe—from the Paradise Trinity to the many orders of celestial ministers.

cosmic-3.title: The Thought Adjuster: Your Inner Divine Compass
cosmic-3.description: Understanding the indwelling presence of God
cosmic-3.logline: Discover the remarkable fragment of God living within your mind—your divine pilot guiding your spiritual evolution.

cosmic-4.title: Our Local Universe: Nebadon's Organization
cosmic-4.logline: Learn about our local universe Nebadon—its creation, administration, and the personalities who manage our cosmic neighborhood.

cosmic-5.title: Angels Among Us: The Seraphic Hosts
cosmic-5.logline: Explore the fascinating reality of angels—their nature, purpose, and how they interact with humans throughout our lives.

cosmic-6.title: Life After Death: The Ascension Career
cosmic-6.description: Understanding the progressive journey after mortal life
cosmic-6.logline: The mansion worlds are just the beginning—discover your epic journey through the universe after mortal death.

cosmic-7.title: Urantia's Remarkable History
cosmic-7.logline: The untold story of Earth's (Urantia's) formation, early life development, and the emergence of humanity.

cosmic-8.title: The Lucifer Rebellion: Cosmic Crisis
cosmic-8.description: Understanding the rebellion's impact on Earth's spiritual development
cosmic-8.logline: The cosmic rebellion that isolated our world and continues to influence human affairs—discover the truth behind the myths of Satan.

cosmic-9.title: Adam & Eve: The True Story
cosmic-9.description: Revealing the actual mission and impact of Adam and Eve
cosmic-9.logline: The real mission of Adam and Eve on our world went far beyond the biblical garden story—discover their true purpose and legacy.

cosmic-10.title: Melchizedek Missions: Divine Interventions
cosmic-10.description: Understanding key spiritual interventions in human history
cosmic-10.logline: Explore how Melchizedek's emergency mission to Salem became the foundation for Judaism, Christianity, and Islam.

cosmic-11.title: Evolution of Religion: From Fear to Faith
cosmic-11.description: Tracing the development of human religious concepts
cosmic-11.logline: Follow humanity's religious evolution from primitive fear of nature through ghost cults to enlightened spiritual understanding.

cosmic-12.title: Genuine Spirituality: The Reality of Religious Experience
cosmic-12.logline: Go beyond doctrine and ritual to discover the authentic reality of personal religious experience and spiritual growth.

cosmic-13.title: The Supreme Being: Evolving Deity
cosmic-13.description: Understanding the concept of experiential Deity
cosmic-13.logline: Discover God the Supreme—the evolving Deity whose growth depends on all our experiences and achievements in time and space.

cosmic-14.title: The Divine Family: Understanding Eternal Relationships
cosmic-14.description: Exploring the relationships among divine personalities
cosmic-14.logline: Explore the relationships between the Universal Father, Eternal Son, and Infinite Spirit—the divine family at the core of all reality.
